format: inc (included configuration script for build system)
description: This file contains build configuration settings, feature flags, and target-specific options for the 'xscale' architecture in a build system, likely BitBake or Yocto. It sets variables, includes other configuration snippets, and defines feature-specific flags for compilation and packaging targeting ARM's Xscale processors.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: A utility function used in build configuration scripts to check if a list or string contains a specific value, used here to conditionally set flags based on features.
